mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_GALLERY (free_title, free_contents, username, write_time, count) VALUES (#{free_title}, #{free_contents}, #{username}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d-%h-%m'), #{count});
mapper.select: SELECT fg.*, a.nickname, DATE_FORMAT(fg.write_time, '%m %d %H:%i') AS formatted_time FROM FREE_GALLERY AS fg JOIN members AS a ON fg.username = a.username ORDER BY free_number DESC LIMIT #{First}, #{amount};
select count(*) AS gallery_free_total from FREE_GALLERY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO g_GALLERY (G_TITLE, G_CONTENTS, username, write_time, g_count) VALUES (#{g_title}, #{g_contents}, #{username}, now(), #{count})
mapper.select: select g.*, a.nickname from g_GALLERY AS g JOIN members AS a on g.username = a.username order by G_NUMBER desc limit #{First}, #{amount}
select count(*) AS gallery_g_total from G_GALLERY
select g.*, a.nickname from G_GALLERY AS g join members AS a on g.username = a.username where g_number = #{g_number}
select fg.*, a.nickname from FREE_GALLERY AS fg join members as a on fg.username = a.username where free_number = #{free_number}
select g.*, a.nickname from g_GALLERY as g JOIN members as a on g.username = a.username where g_number = #{g_number}
